NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF HOME BUILDERS et al., Petitioners,
v.
DEFENDERS OF WILDLIFE et al.
Environmental Protection Agency, Petitioner,
v.
Defenders of Wildlife et al.

Nos. 06-340, 06-549.

Supreme Court of United States.

Argued April 17, 2007.
Decided June 25, 2007.

*2524 Edwin S. Kneedler, for the petitioners.

Eric R. Glitzenstein, for the respondents.

Paul D. Clement, Solicitor General, Counsel of Record, Department of Justice, Washington, D.C., for Petitioner Environmental Protection Agency.

Terry Goddard, Arizona Attorney General, Mary O'Grady, Solicitor General, Paula S. Bickett, Counsel of Record, Chief Counsel, Civil Appeals, James T. Skardon, Assistant Attorney General, Phoenix, Arizona, for State of Arizona.
